snippet: Ronald Dillon, who takes customer-service calls for the New York City agency, was found guilty of acts of insubordination and suspended.
abstract: Ronald Dillon, customer service representative for New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, is found guilty of acts of insubordination and is suspended without pay for 20 days; Dillon's supervisor said he answered calls like a robot despite repeated warnings to stop.
lead_paragraph: Ronald Dillon, who takes customer-service calls for the New York City agency, was found guilty of acts of insubordination and suspended.

headline.main: Health Dept. Worker Suspended. One Complaint: He Talked Like a Robot.
headline.print_headline: A City Worker Is Suspended. One Complaint: He Talked Like a Robot.
